feed.title: BCD-watch: Changes Report (weekly)
feed.subtitle: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Sep 01 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 25 August 2025 through Monday, 1 September 2025ğŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +6, -0

Support increases (6)

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â downloadWillBegin_event
    Added to Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  2. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â downloadWillBegin_event â context_parameter
    Added to Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  3. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â downloadWillBegin_event â navigation_parameter
    Added to Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  4. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â downloadWillBegin_event â suggestedFilename_parameter
    Added to Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  5. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â downloadWillBegin_event â timestamp_parameter
    Added to Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  6. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â downloadWillBegin_event â url_parameter
    Added to Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 35

Show all 35 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (19)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 22 August 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api â HTMLButtonElement â command â request-close
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  3 of 3 engines
  2. api â Document â adoptedStyleSheets â mutable
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  3 of 3 engines
  3. api â GPUSupportedFeatures â feature_core-features-and-limits
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  4. api â ImageData â ImageData â settings_parameter â pixelFormat_option
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  5. api â RTCEncodedAudioFrame â getMetadata â return_object_property_audioLevel
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css â properties â text-autospace
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  3 of 3 engines

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver â bidi â browser â removeUserContext â userContext_parameter
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  2 of 3 engines
  2. webdriver â bidi â browser â setClientWindowState
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  3. webdriver â bidi â browser â setClientWindowState â clientWindow_parameter
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  4. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptClosed_event â type_parameter â alert
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  1 of 3 engines
  5. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptClosed_event â type_parameter â beforeunload
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  1 of 3 engines
  6. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptClosed_event â type_parameter â confirm
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  1 of 3 engines
  7. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptClosed_event â type_parameter â prompt
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  1 of 3 engines
  8. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptOpened_event â type_parameter â alert
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  1 of 3 engines
  9. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptOpened_event â type_parameter â beforeunload
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  1 of 3 engines
  10. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptOpened_event â type_parameter â confirm
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  1 of 3 engines
  11. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptOpened_event â type_parameter â prompt
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  1 of 3 engines
  12. webdriver â bidi â session â new â capabilities_parameter â capability_matching
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines

HTML

  1. html â elements â button â command â request-close
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  3 of 3 engines

New entries (16)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 22 August 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (â€œRemoved BCD entriesâ€) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

  1. api â Document â adoptedStyleSheets â mutable
  2. api â GPUSupportedFeatures â feature_core-features-and-limits
  3. api â ImageData â ImageData â settings_parameter â pixelFormat_option
  4. api â RTCEncodedAudioFrame â getMetadata â return_object_property_audioLevel

HTML

  1. html â elements â button â command â request-close

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver â bidi â browser â setClientWindowState
  2. webdriver â bidi â browser â setClientWindowState â clientWindow_parameter
  3. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptClosed_event â type_parameter â alert
  4. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptClosed_event â type_parameter â beforeunload
  5. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptClosed_event â type_parameter â confirm
  6. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptClosed_event â type_parameter â prompt
  7. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptOpened_event â type_parameter â alert
  8. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptOpened_event â type_parameter â beforeunload
  9. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptOpened_event â type_parameter â confirm
  10. webdriver â bidi â browsingContext â userPromptOpened_event â type_parameter â prompt
  11. webdriver â bidi â session â new â capabilities_parameter â capability_matching

Removed entries (0)

No features were removed from bcd in this time period
  • Previous report: Monday, 25 August 2025

BCD Watch: A service of

This report was generated by diffing v7.0.0 (Friday, 22 August 2025) and v7.1.1 (Friday, 29 August 2025)

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Aug 25 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 18 August 2025 through Monday, 25 August 2025ğŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +0, -0

BCD Metadata Changes: 12

Show all 12 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (6)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 15 August 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api â QuotaExceededError â QuotaExceededError
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  2. api â QuotaExceededError
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  3. api â QuotaExceededError â quota
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  4. api â QuotaExceededError â requested
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines

HTML

  1. html â elements â input â type_date â disables_invalid_values_in_picker_ui
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  3 of 3 engines

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions â api â userScripts â execute
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines

New entries (6)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 15 August 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (â€œRemoved BCD entriesâ€) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

  1. api â QuotaExceededError â QuotaExceededError
  2. api â QuotaExceededError
  3. api â QuotaExceededError â quota
  4. api â QuotaExceededError â requested

HTML

  1. html â elements â input â type_date â disables_invalid_values_in_picker_ui

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions â api â userScripts â execute

Removed entries (0)

No features were removed from bcd in this time period
  • Previous report: Monday, 18 August 2025

entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 11 August 2025 through Monday, 18 August 2025ğŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +50, -0

Support increases (50)

API

    Added to Firefox  â  1 of 3 engines

    Added to Firefox  â  1 of 3 engines

JAVASCRIPT

    Added to Chrome  â  3 of 3 engines

WEBDRIVER

    Added to Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines

    Added to Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines

Show all 37 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (7)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Saturday, 9 August 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

New entries (30)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Saturday, 9 August 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (â€œRemoved BCD entriesâ€) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Aug 11 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 4 August 2025 through Monday, 11 August 2025ğŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +8, -0

Support increases (8)

API

  1. api â Element â scrollIntoView â options_container_parameter
    Added to Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  2. api â RTCRtpSender â setParameters â parameters_encodings_parameter â codec
    Added to Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines

WEBDRIVER

    Added to Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Aug 04 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 28 July 2025 through Monday, 4 August 2025ğŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +6, -0

Support increases (6)

API

  1. api â Animation â commitStyles â endpoint_inclusive_commitStyles
    Added to Firefox  â  1 of 3 engines

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions â api â storage â StorageArea â getKeys
    Added to Firefox  â  3 of 3 engines
  2. webextensions â api â storage â local â getKeys
    Added to Firefox  â  3 of 3 engines
  3. webextensions â api â storage â managed â getKeys
    Added to Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  4. webextensions â api â storage â session â getKeys
    Added to Firefox  â  3 of 3 engines
  5. webextensions â api â storage â sync â getKeys
    Added to Firefox  â  3 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 27

Show all 27 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (12)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Saturday, 26 July 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api â Selection â collapse â accepts_nodes_in_shadow_trees
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  2 of 3 engines
  2. api â Selection â extend â accepts_nodes_in_shadow_trees
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  2 of 3 engines
  3. api â Selection â setBaseAndExtent â accepts_nodes_in_shadow_trees
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  2 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css â types â anchor-size
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  3 of 3 engines
  2. css â types â anchor-size â inset_margin
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  3 of 3 engines

JAVASCRIPT

  1. javascript â builtins â AsyncDisposableStack â @@asyncDispose
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  2. javascript â builtins â AsyncIterator â @@asyncDispose
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  3. javascript â builtins â DisposableStack â @@dispose
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  4. javascript â builtins â Iterator â @@dispose
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  5. javascript â builtins â SuppressedError â error
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  6. javascript â builtins â SuppressedError â suppressed
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  7. javascript â statements â await_using
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines

New entries (13)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Saturday, 26 July 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (â€œRemoved BCD entriesâ€) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

  1. api â Animation â commitStyles â endpoint_inclusive_commitStyles

JAVASCRIPT

  1. javascript â builtins â AsyncDisposableStack â @@asyncDispose
  2. javascript â builtins â AsyncIterator â @@asyncDispose
  3. javascript â builtins â DisposableStack â @@dispose
  4. javascript â builtins â Iterator â @@dispose
  5. javascript â builtins â SuppressedError â error
  6. javascript â builtins â SuppressedError â suppressed
  7. javascript â statements â await_using

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions â api â storage â StorageArea â getKeys
  2. webextensions â api â storage â local â getKeys
  3. webextensions â api â storage â managed â getKeys
  4. webextensions â api â storage â session â getKeys
  5. webextensions â api â storage â sync â getKeys

Removed entries (2)

The entries in this section were found in BCD on Saturday, 26 July 2025, but are no longer present. The reasons for this removal can be anything from an experimental proposal that was never supported to a property or value being renamed to something else.

  2. css â selectors â -moz-focus-inner
